name: UNWOUND (JamesMilller, Athied)
description:
You're an unstable being made of yarn. Try and stay off of the ground by grappling to the glowing hook points, as each second you spend on it you are slowly being unwound. Pull apart enemies to build up thread and pass over an altar to heal yourself! 

CONTROLS:

Movement - WASD

LControl or LShift - Slide

Left mouse - Fire needle

Right mouse - Return/pull needle

Aim for their heads!

Made for LudumDare49 with Athied and music by Decx03.
Font - Alagard by Hewett Tsoi

Post Jam Updates:
* Added resolution setting
